CustomField.formula: IMAGE(CASE( Satisfaction_Level__c,"Very Satisfied", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "Satisfied", "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "Not Very Satisfied", "/img/samples/stars_100.gif","/img/samples/stars_100.gif"),"No Satisfaction Level")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Custom Formula Field based on satisfaction level
CustomField.label: Satisfaction Indicator
